message.raw:
Made aggregation plot use plotmath in labels
Made aggregation about 10X faster
Made aggregation use Annotations object framework for working with
  all annotations (GeneAnnotations as subclass).
Changed references to "transcription" view (exons/introns) to "splicing" view.

Made aggregation plot use plotmath in labels
Made aggregation about 10X faster

all annotations (GeneAnnotations as subclass).

message.raw:
Added unified log syntax
Added unified Segmentation/Annotations class hierarchy
Unified BED/GFF/GTF parsing to support all for all file inputs
Made usage arguments more consistently named
Added qvalue (Storey et al.) to significance calculation in aggregation
Spellchecked documentation
Installation script update

message.raw:
Split translational and transcriptional views in gene aggregation
  (and added a special html div for it)
Changed the aggregation rug significance into bars to avoid zebra striping
  when the sample size is low
Change mnemonic parser to support regex's in mnemonic files
  --allow-regex has been added to gmtk-parameters
Removed default substitutions in tracknames (opting for default
  substitution file)
Removed some nice things in the aggregation divs so that they could be
  regenerated when replotting.
message.html:
Split translational and transcriptional views in gene aggregation
(and added a special html div for it)
Changed the aggregation rug significance into bars to avoid zebra striping
when the sample size is low
Change mnemonic parser to support regex's in mnemonic files
--allow-regex has been added to gmtk-parameters
Removed default substitutions in tracknames (opting for default
substitution file)
Removed some nice things in the aggregation divs so that they could be
regenerated when replotting.

summary.raw:
Split translational and transcriptional views in gene aggregation
  (and added a special html div for it)
Changed the aggregation rug significance into bars to avoid zebra striping
  when the sample size is low
Change mnemonic parser to support regex's in mnemonic files
  --allow-regex has been added to gmtk-parameters
Removed default substitutions in tracknames (opting for default
  substitution file)
Removed some nice things in the aggregation divs so that they could be
  regenerated when replotting.
summary.html:
Split translational and transcriptional views in gene aggregation
(and added a special html div for it)
Changed the aggregation rug significance into bars to avoid zebra striping
when the sample size is low
Change mnemonic parser to support regex's in mnemonic files
--allow-regex has been added to gmtk-parameters
Removed default substitutions in tracknames (opting for default
substitution file)
Removed some nice things in the aggregation divs so that they could be
regenerated when replotting.

values.message:
Split translational and transcriptional views in gene aggregation
  (and added a special html div for it)
Changed the aggregation rug significance into bars to avoid zebra striping
  when the sample size is low
Change mnemonic parser to support regex's in mnemonic files
  --allow-regex has been added to gmtk-parameters
Removed default substitutions in tracknames (opting for default
  substitution file)
Removed some nice things in the aggregation divs so that they could be
  regenerated when replotting.

message.raw:
Made segmentations more object-based, so function relevant to
segmentations are now part of the Segmentation class.
Feature-aggregation now has some rudimentary "significance" measure and
displays things with respect to probability-normalized enrichment.
message.html:
Made segmentations more object-based, so function relevant to
segmentations are now part of the Segmentation class.
Feature-aggregation now has some rudimentary "significance" measure and
displays things with respect to probability-normalized enrichment.

message.raw:
Long-needed commit with many bug fixes.
Improved tab file format for overlap/signal/aggregation plots
Added signal statistics heatmap plotting.
Added progress bar functionality
Addded unit testing framework
Removed overlap statistics plotting and GSC interface (commented out)
Added trackname translation ability to statistics plotting.
message.html:
Long-needed commit with many bug fixes.
Improved tab file format for overlap/signal/aggregation plots
Added signal statistics heatmap plotting.
Added progress bar functionality
Addded unit testing framework
Removed overlap statistics plotting and GSC interface (commented out)
Added trackname translation ability to statistics plotting.

summary.raw:
Long-needed commit with many bug fixes.
Improved tab file format for overlap/signal/aggregation plots
Added signal statistics heatmap plotting.
Added progress bar functionality
Addded unit testing framework
Removed overlap statistics plotting and GSC interface (commented out)
Added trackname translation ability to statistics plotting.
summary.html:
Long-needed commit with many bug fixes.
Improved tab file format for overlap/signal/aggregation plots
Added signal statistics heatmap plotting.
Added progress bar functionality
Addded unit testing framework
Removed overlap statistics plotting and GSC interface (commented out)
Added trackname translation ability to statistics plotting.

values.message:
Long-needed commit with many bug fixes.
Improved tab file format for overlap/signal/aggregation plots
Added signal statistics heatmap plotting.
Added progress bar functionality
Addded unit testing framework
Removed overlap statistics plotting and GSC interface (commented out)
Added trackname translation ability to statistics plotting.

message.raw:
Started migrating gtf and gff parsing over to using a segmentation-like object
Fixed bug in overlap.py that caused some incorrect values when the features
  overlap (zero difference when both files are segmentations, however).
Fixed a few small bugs in bed_compare.
Introduced testing framework and basic tests for bed_compare and overlap.
Fixed a bug in overlap plotting that caused colors in significance plot to
  not correspond to the overlap plot.
Added overlap functionality for printing the features that the segmentation
  overlaps with.
message.html:
Started migrating gtf and gff parsing over to using a segmentation-like object
Fixed bug in overlap.py that caused some incorrect values when the features
overlap (zero difference when both files are segmentations, however).
Fixed a few small bugs in bed_compare.
Introduced testing framework and basic tests for bed_compare and overlap.
Fixed a bug in overlap plotting that caused colors in significance plot to
not correspond to the overlap plot.
Added overlap functionality for printing the features that the segmentation
overlaps with.

values.message:
Started migrating gtf and gff parsing over to using a segmentation-like object
Fixed bug in overlap.py that caused some incorrect values when the features
  overlap (zero difference when both files are segmentations, however).
Fixed a few small bugs in bed_compare.
Introduced testing framework and basic tests for bed_compare and overlap.
Fixed a bug in overlap plotting that caused colors in significance plot to
  not correspond to the overlap plot.
Added overlap functionality for printing the features that the segmentation
  overlaps with.

message.raw:
Added verbose option to segmentation loading
Tweaked segmentation loading to allow mixed integer/string labels
(while still being as fast as possible)
Added bed_compare (with --edit-distance) for base-wise edit distance between
two bed files.

Added verbose option to segmentation loading
Tweaked segmentation loading to allow mixed integer/string labels
(while still being as fast as possible)
Added bed_compare (with --edit-distance) for base-wise edit distance between
two bed files.
